name: My Favorite Match
description:
No breakup is easy. After her heart's been shattered by the man she'd loved for years, the protagonist is approached by a young man offering his services as a matchmaker to help restore her faith in love. Can she trust him? Can she love again?

Or will opening up only hurt her more?

This game was created for the TyranoBuilder Summer Game Jam 2015 under the theme "United By Fate".
